metadata.title: ChargerCity Mini Live Periscope Record Tablet Tripod Mount for Apple iPad Mini Google Nexus 7 8 9 FHD Samsung Galaxy Tab 7" to 9" inch Screen Tablet w/360 Degree Adjustment 1/4-20 Thread Adapter
features: New innovative, Assembled in the USA Universal Tripod Adapter will allow you to sit your Apple New Ipad Mini & Any 7"-7.9" Tablet with rear view video camera directly on to your Tripod (Tripod is sold separately)
Adjustable tablet holder fits any tablet 7 to 8 Inch screen with or without a case or skin
Great to record Outdoor sporting activities with your Tablet
No Tools required easy install (Perfect to use it as a photobooth adapter)
Designed to be compatible with nearly all 7"-8" Screen tablets including the iPad Mini, Nexus 7, Sony, Samsung Galaxy, Asus, Acer Dell Streak 7, Motorola Xoom, HTC Flyer & more
description: ChargerCity's Tripod mount allows easy mounting and positioning of your tablet (7" to 8" Screen) on to your Tripod. Use it anywhere you desire (Setup Photobooth at Wedding, Party, Meetings, Golf Shot Practice or sporting events). Our innovative yet simple mounting solution not only is COST EFFICIENT but easy to install and use (No Tools required).
